content:
along with other local sustainability groups members of the Student Environmental Action Coalition will be attending the annual Fossil Fools Day celebration in Richmond PERIOD

At the April  event SEAC will deliver a petition to Gov PERIOD Tim Kaine explaining the opposition to the proposed Coal Power Plant in Wise County a project planned by Dominion Virginia Power PERIOD

SEAC will also help hand out the Foolie Awards which are conferred annually to the worlds biggest contributors to our global addiction to fossil fuels. save my name email and website in this browser for the next time I comment PERIOD
